sense.def:
Kadar je oseba ali stvar
unrecognized
, je ljudje ne prepoznajo ali o njej ne vedo ničesar.

seg.quote: Unrecognized by any of the women, he entered the house.
There was another consequence, at that time almost unrecognised.

sense.def:
Kadar so dosežki ali lastnosti nekoga
unrecognized
, jih ljudje ne cenijo.

seg.quote: It is a disgrace that such talent should go unrecognised.
